baseUnitOfMeasureId.description: Specifies the ID of the unit of measure.

blocked.description: Specifies that entries cannot be posted to the item. True indicates account is blocked and posting is not allowed.

displayName.description: Specifies the item's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the item.

gtin.description: This is the Global Trade Item Number.

id.description: The unique ID of the item. Non-editable.

inventory.description: Specifies how many units, such as pieces, boxes, or cans, of the item are in inventory. Read-Only.

itemCategoryCode.description: The code of the item category in the item.

itemCategoryId.description: The ID of the item category in the item.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last datetime the item was modified. Read-Only.

number.description: Specifies the number of the item.

priceIncludesTax.description: Specifies that the unitPrice includes tax. Set to true, if unitPrice includes tax.

taxGroupCode.description: A Tax Group represents a group of inventory items or resources that are subject to identical tax terms.

taxGroupId.description: Specifies the ID of the Tax Group for the item.

type.description: Specifies the type of the item. It can be 'Inventory', 'Service' or 'Non-Inventory'.

anyOf.description: The unit cost of each individual item in the item.

unitPrice.description: Specifies the price for one unit of the item in the specified item.
